item.sapswackystuff.slime_pearl.tooltip: Will bounce on %d blocks before teleporting
By coating an ender pearl with slime,
we make it so it can bounce on anything
item.sapswackystuff.phantom_pearl.toolti: Will travel through %d blocks before teleporting

This pearl uses the eldritch properties
of phantoms to phase through reality
item.sapswackystuff.redstone_pearl.toolt:
The redstone contained within power
a clock for a timely teleportation
item.sapswackystuff.lovers_pearl.tooltip:
An unbound pearl.
shift-click to bind yourself to it

It is said that lovers used to
exchange these at their wedding
as proof of their trust..
